title: Board Games | 7.25.08
content: Today I opened my closest to get a jacket... I noticed all of the board games that have not been played for a very long time.
author: Wesley.Bancroft

comments.content:
Are they lonely?

At least all your board games will \*fit\* in a closet. I have ~400.

a few months ago i found ’Welcome Back Kotter: The Up Your Nose With A Rubber Hose Game’, and ’CHiPS:The Game’  
the boards are rad, but no one wants to play with me :(
